scene_target: Kaelen survives the first skirmish with the Void-touched shadow-forms.
goal: Defend against the emerging shadow-forms drawn to the shard's light and escape the crater floor.
conflict: Kaelen's fractured Oath-magic is unpredictable and physically agonizing against the relentless, alien shadow-forms.
required_callbacks: The physical pewter filament in Kaelen's radius bone
The metallic scent of magic and the frost-burn cost
end_condition: Kaelen repels the immediate shadow-forms and begins his ascent out of the glass-choked crater.

world_updates.location: Silver Valley - Rim of the Impact Crater
recent_facts: Kaelen survived the first skirmish with shadow-forms by discharging a massive wave of fractured Oath-magic.
The pewter filament in Kaelen's radius bone is severely depleted and physically damaged.
Kaelen has successfully ascended from the crater floor to the rim.
The star-shard remains in Kaelen's possession, its pulse now stabilized but still active.

last_scene: Kaelen was ambushed by shadow-forms within the impact crater of the Silver Valley.
He utilized the volatile energy of his fractured pewter Oath-filament to repel the creatures at a high physical cost.
After a grueling climb up the glass-slicked walls, Kaelen reached the crater's rim, escaping the immediate threat.
key_events: Shadow-forms emerged from the impact glass, drawn to the star-shard's resonance.
Kaelen experienced the grinding agony of the physical pewter filament in his radius bone during magic use.
Kaelen suffered significant frost-burn and waxy skin discoloration on his right arm.
A massive discharge of violet energy destroyed the pursuing shadow-forms and the ledge they occupied.
Kaelen reached the safety of the crater rim, though his arm is currently non-functional.
must_stay_true: The Starwrought Oath is a physical pewter-colored filament woven into the marrow of the radius bone.
Magic use causes physical frost-burn, scorched lungs, and metallic scents.
The star-shard is a physical object currently held in Kaelen's satchel.
The shadow-forms are attracted to the shard's 'thump-hiss' resonance.
Kaelen's right arm is severely injured from the Oath's fracture and subsequent discharge.
chapter_so_far_add: Kaelen survived a direct confrontation with the Void-touched using the last of his stable Oath-essence.
